arts.ttl: MLS All-Stars 3-1 Liga MX All-Stars: MLS bounce back after 2024 defeat
arts.sum: The half ended in favour of the MLS All-Star, but both teams had more to give in the second fourty five. The first big moment of the game came in the 12th minute when Brazilian winger Evander struck from outside the box but was denied by an Luis Malag√≥n, who got down low to push the ball away from goal.

arts.ttl: MLS All-Stars Defeat Liga MX All-Stars in 2025 Showcase
arts.sum: MLS All-Stars got revenge over their Liga MX counterparts at Q2 Stadium in Austin.

arts.ttl: Messi, Alba won't play in MLS All-Star Game
arts.sum: Inter Miami stars Lionel Messi and Jordi Alba will not play in Wednesday's MLS All-Star Game, MLS confirmed.
